availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Furtney Brown (Louisville, Kentucky, saddle tree maker)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, saddle tree maker. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Hardesty Brown in 1824. Father of Susan Brown and Caleb Brown. Saddler in Louisville in 1850. Saddle tree maker in Louisville in 1860.

ab.bibl:

Find A Grave, "Furtney Brown (February 1, 1800-November 17, 1872)," Memorial #73382098, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/73382098 (accessed July 9, 2019).
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/District 1, p. 25B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 441.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, 4th Ward Louisville, p. 352A.
